reviews.review: the best

Well if you didn't believe the review scores, let me put into words just how good this game is. There will be negatives believe it or not.

You see, dear reader, when a game is being developed compromises must be made because money is finite. So we end up with games with good stories and crap gameplay or vice versa. This is not the case with Half-Life 2. All aspects of the game are almost equally good to one another and to other games from 2004 (hell even 2017).

Positives:

+ Delightful characters. Well written and designed.
+ Very good gameplay. Weapons are responsive and it's nice and satisfying when you use them. 
+ Very atmospheric! Seriously, the designer(s) have purposfully used a communist style architecture so you'll get the dystopian feel. There's a level where the horror is nailed much better than dedicated horror games! This is Half-Life 2's strongest aspect - the atmosphere.
+ There is a lot of diversity (when this word was associated positivley) into the game. You'll be on the run, being almost defensless, you'll be a resistance fighter, you'll drive a boat through toxic wastes, you'll go on a journey with a car visiting abanddoned (or not) settlements, you'll play a pseudo platforming if you don't want to get eaten, you'll see how horror should made in a infested village, you'll be a beastmaster commaning deadly animals.. The game bleeds of effort. (The different stages are not chronological to not spoil).
+ The story is nice and mysterious. There's philosophy and morality. You have no choice but this game isn't about choice. You're a listener and receiver. Few FPS games have such intriguing story.
+ The A.I. is good so you'll be challenged. They use tactics.
+ The gravity gun and physics as a whole. The gun is fun and practical to use. It encourages creativity and freedom. Physics makes the game feel much better. Object react to you and it's fun to blast enemies away. Note the game came out in 2004 so this was a big deal back then.
+ The sound is very subtle and it does a great job at amplifiying the feelings of the current situation. it's atmospheric. Just like the rest of the game.

Negatives (you didn't believe me did you?):

- When you've recruited enough followers they'll start getting pretty annoying when they block you from exiting rooms. For instance if you enter a room to explore, all of them will follow you in and it will become a clusterfuck at the door. They won't move because they are following so you'll have to push them or you'll have to get deeper into the room so they'll make space for you to exit. But most room you enter aren't that big so you'll have to push. Note this isn't that big of a deal. You'll start getting followers towards the end of the game and only on some levels so this is a minor problem.
- Another problem is that the dialogs between NPCs' are unskippable so if you do multiple playthoughts or want to speed throught the game you'll be annoyed. A minor problem, especially for first timers.
- Lastly, except the gravity gun and the crossbow the other weapons are kinda standard. Pistol, submachine gun, shotgun etc. You have a pulse rifle with a neat secondary ability but still.. Considering the positives of this game I feel bad for mentioning this :(

Neutrals:

+/- The driving sequences can be seen both as good and bad. For some this might be an awesome example of diversity of gameplay, for others it might be an inconveniece.
+/- It has puzzles. Again some might feel this is just annoying and unneeded padding, for others it might be a good time to use the gravity gun.
+/- Silent protagonist. Many (including myself) consider this lack of feature to actually deepen the game because you can easily project youself into the character of Gordon Freeman. Others might find it dull and weird their character hasn't uttered a word all game and has no personality.

As you can see the game isn't perfect but it sure is close to it! The negatives are minor inconeviences while the positives encompass big aspects of the every video game. The quality of those aspects, at the time, were better than other dedicated games at just one aspect. Hell some if them are rivaling even todays' games.

Half-Life 2 is a game which shows effort, dedication and quality while sacrificing almost nothing in return.
Легендарная игра, Она будет вечной.

I have found this one overrated. I know I have played it more than 10 years after the release date, but I still enjoy FPS classics such as Unreal, Duke Nukem 3D, whereas Half-Life 2 was a "not bad" experience at best. I don't get why the story is found so spectecular, which in my opinion is not. Yes, the graphics are good, gravity gun is interesting but the game gave me the feeling of "hey, now we are using the gravity in our games and this is very innovative. so you should appreciate it as a classic". No... Half-Life 2 is not the best game ever made, it is not even a classic. It is, however, a fairly good game with good sound and atmosphere, average story and shooting physics and some spectacular graphics for its time. There are some chapters that are too long, such as the ones where you use an airboat, in which the game feels more like a tech demo where the devs are trying to impress. And the worst thing about the game, a huge minus, is that Half-Life 2 will likely give you nausea. I have been playing shooters forever, never have I suffered a nausea in a game, which I believe indicates some serious design mistakes.

Игра замечательная, соскучиться не успеваешь банально, с каждой главой экшна всё больше и больше,  Всё начнётся с того, что вас везут на поезде с пересадкой до Нова-Проспект, [spoiler] хорошо что вы туда не доберётесь, об этом будет известно далее в игре. [/spoiler] Высадившись же, вы увидите диктатурный режим от Доктора Брина, который же начал сотрудничать с вышестоящим инопланетным Альянсом. Стоит только переступить порог от обычного гражданина и не сесть на поезд, который вам так и "подмигивал" через решётку, вы сразу становитесь (!) Преступником Номер Один. Вот тут то и вы вступаете в игру. 

Плюсы:
- 2 вида техники, которая имеет свои особенности.
- Хорошая на то время графика.
- Тянут почти все компьютеры, ну наверное только DOS системники не потянут. Вообщем никто не останется без игры.
- Интересные фишки с физикой, в том числе и использование её в бою.
- Разнообразное оружие.
- Хорошая анимация персонажей.

Минусы:
- 3 цифра? (кто не понял, тот поймёт)
- В озвучке есть ошибки, приходится искать патчи в интернете.

Great engine, very polished and optimised (I am a Linux gamer). The plot is exciting and there are many nice gameplay features (such as transport or allies), a few interesting puzzles (a.k.a. how to open this, how to get there). After several evenings I completed the game on the Hardest difficulty even though I'm far from hardcore gamer but I felt the difficulty level wasn't even close to the HL1: too many medkits, too much ammo, enemies are not as deadly. I bought it and didn't regret.

well i finally completed this game after almost 20 hours of playing it took a long time but let me first sum up the good things and the bad of this game...

GOOD: - nice action and a lot of different foes to deal with 
- a large choice of weapons ( i think it is around 10 different weapons) 
- nice story line altough i did not play half life 1 i liked it.

BAD: - i think they should have gave some more instructions how certain weapons and things can be used i know you might think it's just a fps but there really were some nice extra's i only found out at the ending of the game.
- that hev suit man WHAT A JOKE HAHAAHAH come man you can run for like ten seconds and then your suit has too reload, while reloading you cannot youse the flashlight and you are not able to run got me killed like ALOT ! so this was supposed to give you strength or so ? man it should have been named  HIV suit that suit gave me more AIDS then 10 hookers in one night could give me XD 

- they stick around with details way to much, there is a time where you are able to ride a boat okay nice but it took me 5 hours to complete that part maybe i just suck or maybe think about it the game sticks to much with certain parts ... also the car part was very long and from time to time really boring...

- the objectives were so stupid first you have to teleport yourself to a doctor then this doctor gets caught by the villains in the game you have to save this bloke TWICE come on the game should had worked the objectives out better...

CONCLUSION: i liked the game i never expected a game from 2004 to be cool. but the game gets really boring from time to time they stick around with too much details in my opinion. but i should not complain i bought this for 1 euro wich really is a bargain but with people who paid the whole price... i am sorry but i would never give ten euro's could buy a new quake or so... so yes buy it but only in sale.

Lo recomiendo principalmente por tratarse de una parte importante de la historia de los juegos. Pero en lo personal me parece regular a bueno. Nada del otro mundo, como lo pintan todos.
Primero lo negativo: la historia no me gusta... no me atraen las realidades distópicas y además en este caso me parece vaga. Probablemente por eso mismo no me gustó el arte visual general del juego ni tampoco la música. En cuánto a la jugabilidad solo me pareció mejorable la forma de seleccionar armas, que debe hacerse con dos acciones.
En cuanto a lo positivo: hay mucha variabilidad en los ambientes, las interacciones con el entorno y los objetivos, por lo que no se vuelve repetitivo. Incluso hay que resolver algunos puzzles para seguir avanzando. La física probablemente sea la mejor parte y la IA no está mal tampoco. La gráfica ha envejecido bien también.
En resumen me entretuve jugando, pero no me veo repitiendolo...

Bestes Spiel ever. "Half Life 2" (incl. der beiden Episoden) ist für mich das Maß aller Dinge, wenn es um Ego-Shooter geht. Selbst "Halo", "Bioshock" oder sonst was kann da einfach nicht mithalten. Noch nie hatte ich in einem anderen Spiel dieses unvergleichliche "Mittendrin Gefühl". Warum dies nur HL2 gelingt kann ich gar nicht so richtig erklären. Vielleicht liegt es einfach daran, das hier alles perfekt ineinander greift:

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1130714787
- unerreicht dichte Atmosphäre
- Gameplay fühlt sich einfach super an
- die Geschichte und die glaubhaften Charaktere
- alle Locations sehen glaubwürdig aus (sehr selten in anderen Spielen)
- viele interaktionsmöglichkeiten mit Objekten
- abwechslung durch Fahrzeug Abschnitte
- die gesamte Präsentation

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1169839262
Ich habe das Spiel nun schon etliche Male auf drei Systemen durchgespielt, ohne das es langweilig wird. Ich denke das spricht dann schon für sich. Zudem sieht das Spiel auch heute noch Fantastisch aus. Eine klare Kaufempfehlung für alle, die auch nur ein Fünkchen für Ego Shooter übrig haben.

Что еще можно сказать об игре, которая совершила прорыв в мире шутеров? Хоть и не все играли в эту замечательную игру, но слышать о ней все слышали. Невероятно атмосферная, затягивающая в себя очень таинственным сюжетом, разнообразными локациями, возможностями, эта игра заслуживает самых высоких оценок. Непонятно лишь одно, а хотя наверное понятно, почему не была сделана 3 часть. Все потому, что существуют 2 очень прибыльных проекта: Дота 2 и КС: ГО. Хотя, зная, какой ажиотаж бы вышел вокруг выхода 3 части игры, можно было бы рискнуть для такой-то игры. Но видимо, пока этому не суждено осуществиться, если вообще суждено.
